'''Keyboard layouts for SOK:''' Upload different SOK layouts here.

=== Ubuntu ===

Author: HenrikOmma

==== Features ====

* A minimalistic layout with only four rows of buttons containing the numerals 0-9, the letters and 4 other keys
* Two secondary window panes with symbols (like #, @, %, etc.) and with system kays like F* and PgDn.
* The keys on the symbol pane do not require pressing Shift
* Earthy Colour scheme

=== Scanning ===

Author: HenrikOmma

==== Features ====

* A layout optimised for scan-selection, with the most common letters (in English ATM appearing first). 
* Matrix scan pattern: vertical on first input, horisontal on second, select on third
* Optional: make use of second mouse button

==== Screenshots ====

<nowiki>[[File:sok-scan-base.png]]</nowiki>

==== Download ====
<nowiki>[[attachment:sok-scan-0.1.tar.gz]]</nowiki>

==== Outstanding issues ====
* '''The scanning code itself is not yet implemented'''. This layout is simply designed to facilitate that implementation.
